questList.questDescription: Defeat the Duskshade Revenant lurking in the Twilight Gardens to bring light to the shadows.
Hunt down the Netheria Whisperwind haunting the Twilight Gardens and silence its eerie whispers.
Challenge the Soulweave Binder of the Spectral Guardians to prove your worth as a guardian of the Twilight Gardens.
Confront the Frostfall Archmage in the Dusk Caverns and halt the advance of the Frostbite Undead.
Descend into the Dusk Caverns and vanquish the Glacial Titan haunting its frozen depths.
Seek out the Hailstorm Abomination among the Glacial Phantoms and shatter its icy grip on the Dusk Caverns.
Face off against the Scarlet Infernalist in the Shadowed Ruins and defy the fiery grip of the Infernal Legion.
Uncover the Abyssal Tormentor lurking within the Shadowed Ruins and banish the shadows that threaten to consume all.
Defeat the Wintersoul Monarch reigning over the Chillbone Legion in the depths of the Shadowed Ruins and restore balance to the twilight realm.
